newsitem.title: BRAZIL: State to retain 25 pct in Brazil's Banerj.
newsitem.headline: State to retain 25 pct in Brazil's Banerj.

text.p: Brazil's Rio de Janeiro state plans to retain a minority stake of at least 25 percent in soon-to-be-privatized state bank Banco do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (Banerj), a state planning department spokeswoman said.
The bank is due to sold off at a privatization auction on the Rio de Janeiro stock exchange December 12, and the tender document is due to be published in November or early December.
The spokeswoman said the state was thinking of selling off Banerj in a closed envelope auction.
-- Simona de Logu, Rio de Janeiro newsroom, 5521 507 4151
